    Use Senaps in R with RSenaps package

    Bangyou Zheng

    2021-08-31

    vignette.Rmd

    Introduction

    RSenaps is a R package to communicate with Senaps platform.

    Before start

    A user account needs to be created in Senaps. It it much securer to use api key to make requests to Senaps, NOT the username and pasword. The api key can be stored in the environmental variable and read in your Rscript (e.g. SENAPS_API_KEY).

    The apikey can be set using senaps_option.

    senaps_options(apikey = Sys.getenv('SENAPS_API_KEY'))

    Contents
